attributes.action: Look into the monoply currently in place for car insurance firms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would ask the government to look into the unfair deal given to motorist by insurance companies.
Let me highlight a loophole the companies operate, the car user choses to have a excess on the insurance to keep the costs down, on any damage you pay the amount of excess the insurance pay the rest. but if your car is written off the excess is deducted from any settlement plus the insurance can then sell your car for scrap, this means the customer loses out all round and the insurance fat cats get fatter
